# The `InstrBuilder` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

A builder class that knows how to construct <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instruction">Instruction</a> objects.

Every llvm-mca <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instruction">Instruction</a> is described by an object of class <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mca/instrdesc">InstrDesc</a>. An <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mca/instrdesc">InstrDesc</a> describes which registers are read/written by the instruction, as well as the instruction latency and hardware resources consumed.

This class is used by the tool to construct Instructions and instruction descriptors (i.e. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mca/instrdesc">InstrDesc</a> objects). Information from the machine scheduling model is used to identify processor resources that are consumed by an instruction.

Definition at line 62 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/instrbuilder-h">InstrBuilder.h</a>.
